actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to permit public school teachers (and other public school employees) who do not have coverage pursuant to State agreement under the Federal old-age survivors, and disability insurance system to elect coverage under such system as self-employed individuals.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Permits public school teachers and other public school employees who do not have coverage pursuant to State agreement under the Federal old-age, survivors, and disability insurance provisions of the Social Security Act to elect coverage under such Act as self-employed individuals. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 411) (Adds 26 U.S.C. 1402 (i))

titles.title: A bill to permit public school teachers (and other public school employees) who do not have coverage pursuant to State agreement under the Federal old-age survivors, and disability insurance system to elect coverage under such system as self-employed individuals.
